Introduction: Hey! You're the new farmer right?#$b#Nice to be of your acquaintance. I'm Kenneth, an electrician.#$b#Hope you have a good day.
spring_12: I've been craving for some egg pie! I'm glad it's the Egg Festival tomorrow.
spring_23: The forest looks amazing with the flower decorations all around.#$b#I'm looking forward for tomorrow!$h
summer_10: I hope you bring something good for tomorrow @. We don't want disappointing the Governor now.$h#$b#No pressure!$h
summer_27: The beautiful scenery tomorrow night is best appreciated when all lights are turned off.#$b#I love how nature provides us in some ways.$h
fall_15: I'll be helping Ian and Lewis in setting up the town for tomorrow.#$b#I hope it's a huge success.
fall_26: The decorations for tomorrow don't require too much power.#$b#But it's best to be alert and stay careful
winter_7: Oh! I should not forget to bring my fishing rod for tomorrow!$h
winter_14: Are you going to buy some stuff in the night market tomorrow @?#$b#I hope to find some interesting items.$h
winter_24: I get anxious for the Winter Star every year! The decorations use up so much power.#$b#I worry that there may be an power surge.$s
Mon: Good day to you @.#$e#It's gonna be a busy day.
Tue: Got to buy more supplies. I lack some parts.$s#$b#I don't have enough funds at the moment tho.$s#$e#Hm? What?
Wed: I check the lamps at town every week to be safe.#$e#I'm a huge worrywart.$h
Thu: Maru is great help sometimes! She knows so much about circuits!#$e#She seems to do a better job sometimes too.$h
Fri: I'm hungry.$s#$e#I wonder what's on Pika's menu today?
Sat: Uh. Hi.#$e#Sorry, I don't have time to chat.
Sun: My little invention exploded last night.$s#$e#I should ask Maru for some help.
Mon2: I saw a rolling kiwi in the trees the other day when I was fixing some pole wires.#$e#It was weird, It almost looked sentient.
Tue2: Making sure the amplifiers and the system are in top condition is a tiresome task.$s#$e#I sometimes worry because no one uses these stuff too often.$s
Wed2: I wonder if anyone will hold a concert at the village someday?#$e#That could be fun, as well as someone can finally use the systems Lenny bought.
Thu2: Sometimes at night when I fix the town lamps, I see Linus searching up Trash cans.#$e#I'm not bothered by it. I even want to go buy him food. But he refused my offer the other day.$s
Fri2: Maru is a good friend of mine. She teaches me sometimes and I teach her back.#$e#We learn from one another, We often show off our inventions to one another.
Sat2: My little robot exploded and my house almost set on fire last night.$u#$e#Ian came down to help me the moment he heard a bang! I owe him!$h
Sun2: I always make sure the lamps are in top condition! I don't want anyone to get lost in the dark at night.#$e#But to be honest, I'm the one who's afraid of the dark.$s
Mon4: Fixed up the museum's electrical system the other day. I found some interesting stuff hidden in the walls while I was at it.#$e#I wonder who hid them? I told Gunther about them and he was surprised!$h
Tue4: Demetrius has been real welcoming to me. I'm afraid he might get the wrong idea. Maru's like a little sister to me.#$e#I actually root for Harvey and Maru, they seem to have some chemistry they don't know about as well.$h
Wed4: Willy had some problems with his lights the other day. He gave me some crab as thanks for the help.#$e#I gave it to Pika and we had a small feast!$h
Thu4: I have to admit I'm not too fond of fixing the lamps. I mean I like tinkering with the machines it's just...$s#$e#I'm afraid of heights.$s
Fri4: I worry that one of the bulbs might pop anytime. This town is under strict budget.#$e#I wonder why though.
Sat4: Hey there @! How's it going?#$e#I hope you're doing fine.$h
Sun4: I helped make the jukebox that Gus has in his Saloon.#$e#I'm just proud, I just had to share it!$h
Mon6: I've been trying to achieve this concept of 'surround sound' with a television.#$e#Maybe I can use multiple audio boxes.
Tue6: Hey there @! Nice seeing you today!#$e#If you see any problems with the lamps around the valley, please tell me okay?
Wed6: I don't like fixing the systems down the the bus stop at night.#$e#I hear strange noises at certain hours!$u
Thu6: How's it going @? You doing good?#$e#You're a great friend @! Thank you for your friendship!$h
Fri6: Do you have some machines around your farm?#$b#Oh you do! Wow that's awesome!#$e#I hope I can check them out sometime.$h
Sat6: Hey there @! Nice to see you today! How's the farm going?#$e#I have some machines we can test around your field if you want!$h
Sun6: The television I've been fixing is finally working properly!$h#$e#Now to the next problem. I forgot who owned this!$s
Mon8: Want to go with me with my rounds today @?#$e#It could be fun! I mean, I don't know. I hope you find it fun.$h
Tue8: Do you need help with anything around your farm @? I hope I can help.#$e#I'm trying to figure out automating crop harvesting.$h
Wed8: You look great today @. I mean it.$l#$e#Why the sudden compliment? I mean why not?#$b# I hope I brightened up your day!$h
Thu8: Good day to you @! No more work for the day?#$e#Want to hang out for the day? I don't mind your company!$h
Fri8: Hey uhm, How do you get over your fear of the dark?$s#$e#Uhm. Sorry I don't seem so manly.$s#$e#But hey, I don't get too scared when I think of you.$l
Sat8: Fixing up the sound system at the stage can be quite fun now.$h#$e#Want me to sing you a song? Haha I'm just kidding, I'm bad at singing.$h
Sun8: I hope you're doing fine today @. Need any help with something?#$e#I hope I can help you with anything.$h#$e#Just tell me okay?$h
Mon10: You're looking great today @. I can't figure out how I managed to catch your heart.$l#$e#I'm just glad I did like you did mine.$h#$e#Cheesy? I'm sorry, I tried!$h
Tue10: Marnie came by the other day and asked for some help with her television.#$e#It was broken like it was kicked! I was confused. I didn't ask more questions though.#$e#I wonder how it was kicked? It's placed in her room too. Hm?
Wed10: I tried to finish some more work last night. Man I'm so tired! I haven't had any sleep.$s#$e#Oh? What's that? I can sleep on your lap? Don't mind if I do.$l
Thu10: Hi there @. You finished with your work?$h#$e#Want to spend the day together now? You can accompany me with my rounds too if you want.$h
Fri10: Want me to teach you about some circuits?#$b#I saw that you do your own crafting at your farm too. I hope I can help.$h
Sat10: The little things you do are some things I try to remember when I get scared.#$e#You're like a guardian angel to me.$l#$e#Being cheesy again? I'm so sorry!$h
Sun10: Hey @! I'm glad you're here! I have to show you something.#$e#Close your eyes! Okay.#$b#What you see is what my world would be without you.#$b#Okay okay! That was too much now!$h#$e#Oh wait, why are you getting closer?$u#$b#*smooch* Oh! Uhmm. Uhh.. I'm speechless.$l
spring_1: I have to go check up different systems and clear out remaining snow.#$b#It can be dangerous in the long run if you don't manage these machines properly.
summer_1: I can't wait to visit the beach and relax!$h#$b#After my rounds I'll go back home to fetch my beach outfit.
fall_1: It's nice to take a stroll around this season right?#$e#I sometimes get spooked by the random bunnies hopping around though.
winter_1: The snow is pretty and all. But I get worried if some may damage the electrical systems.#$e#I installed some precautions last season. But I can't help but worry.
breakUp: I didn't think it would end up this way. I'm sorry @...$s
danceRejection: I can't dance today @. I'm sorry.$s
divorced: Please don't talk to me... I just..$s
